constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 选取一个非空连续子序列（区间）

constraints.name: removal_constraint
constraints.description: 从选定的子序列中移除一个元素，使得剩余元素的和最大化
constraints.formal: maximize (sum(a[l:r]) - a[j]) for some j in [l, r]

constraints.name: minimization_constraint
constraints.description: 对手会选择移除一个元素，使得剩余元素的和最小化
constraints.formal: minimize (sum(a[l:r]) - a[j]) for some j in [l, r]
